parameters.name: Error
parameters.value:
call to ExecQuery 'UPDATE users SET name=$1, email=$2, type=$3, password=$4 WHERE user_id=$5' with args [{Name: Ordinal:1 Value:uzi} {Name: Ordinal:2 Value:uzi@gmail.com} {Name: Ordinal:3 Value:0} {Name: Ordinal:4 Value:password} {Name: Ordinal:5 Value:7}], was not expected, next expectation is: ExpectedQuery => expecting Query, QueryContext or QueryRow which:
  - matches sql: 'UPDATE users SET name=$1, email=$2, type=$3, password=$4 WHERE user_id=$5'
  - is without arguments
  - should return error: sql: connection is already closed: error in postgres repo
